detail_desc: Joggers in lightweight cotton twill with elastication and a decorative button at the waist, fake front pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back, and ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight cotton twill with elastication and a decorative button at the waist, fake front pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back, and ribbed hems.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood with elastication around the edge. Zip with a chin guard at the front, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Fleece lining.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood with elastication around the edge. Zip with a chin guard at the front, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Fleece lining.

Fleece-lined ski jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front, side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, zipped sleeve pocket, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Reinforced at the knees, hems and back. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a back pocket with a button, and detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Leggings in stretch denim made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt, waistcoat, bow tie and pair of trousers. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons at the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in a lightly brushed weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Set with a checked shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie and a pair of 5-pocket trousers in stretch twill. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie in velvet with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and slim legs with decorative seams at the knees and narrow hems.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned viscose jersey with a collar, V-neck, buttons at the top and short sleeves. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a tie belt and decorative buttons down the skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned viscose jersey with a collar, V-neck, buttons at the top and short sleeves. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a tie belt and decorative buttons down the skirt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in glossy viscose twill with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a contrasting colour trim at the back, and an embroidered motif front and back. Unlined.

Long parka in airy, rustly nylon with a two-way zip down the front and a hood with an elastic drawstring. Handwarmer pockets at the top, large patch front pockets, an elastic drawstring at the waist and straight cut to the hem. Long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.

Long parka in airy, rustly nylon with a two-way zip down the front and a hood with an elastic drawstring. Handwarmer pockets at the top, large patch front pockets, an elastic drawstring at the waist and straight cut to the hem. Long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing around the opening and cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a scalloped edge and crocheted lace trim around the neckline, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Inset, crocheted lace trims at the front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flounced hem.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a scalloped edge and crocheted lace trim around the neckline, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Inset, crocheted lace trims at the front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flounced hem.
Loafers in imitation suede with moccasin seams and decorative lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hairband in a cotton weave with embroidery, a decorative bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides. Lined.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a stretch cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a stretch cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric containing glittery threads with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and flounce at the front and hem.
Small comfort blanket in soft velour and jersey with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling.
Small comfort blanket in soft velour and jersey with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with embroidery front and back, a low crotch and zip fly. The jeans are in a relaxed fit at the top with tapered legs and raw-edge hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Fully lined printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and low-cut back with lacing.
Fully lined printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and low-cut back with lacing.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.

Jacquard-weave blouse in softly draping viscose with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and wide cuffs, glittery embroidered trims around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top with a wide flounce at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a soft, stretchy shaft, round toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.
Sleeveless, loose-fitting top in an airy, patterned weave with fringing. Opening and a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Ankle-length, high-waisted, jacquard-weave trousers in softly draping viscose with a sheen. Concealed zip and button at one side, side pockets and straight legs with creases front and back. Hems with glass-bead and sparkly-stone decorations and a short slit at the back.

Calf-length, jacquard weave dress in softly draping viscose with a sheen. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs, and glass-bead and sparkly-stone decorations around the neckline and cuffs. Slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams. Made partly from recycled polyester.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in an organic cotton weave with a flounce-trimmed seam at the top and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed jersey. Length 35 cm, circumference 50 cm.
